SEARCH
Module clientCLI
Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models

Class AuthenticationModel

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.AuthenticationModel
public class AuthenticationModel extends Object
The AuthenticationModel class provides methods for authenticating users, registering new buyers and sellers, and checking the availability of usernames.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Database
    db
    The database instance used to interact with persistent data.

  • Method Details

    • authenticateBuyer

      public OperationResult authenticateBuyer(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a buyer based on the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The buyer's username.
      password - The buyer's password.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of the authentication.

    • authenticateSeller

      public OperationResult authenticateSeller(String name, String password)
      Authenticates a seller based on the provided name and password.
      Parameters:
      name - The seller's name.
      password - The seller's password.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of the authentication.

    • registerNewBuyer

      public OperationResult registerNewBuyer(String username, String password, String firstName, String lastName, String email, String phoneNumber, String address)
      Registers a new buyer with the specified information.
      Parameters:
      username - The buyer's username.
      password - The buyer's password.
      firstName - The buyer's first name.
      lastName - The buyer's last name.
      email - The buyer's email.
      phoneNumber - The buyer's phone number.
      address - The buyer's address.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of the registration.

    • registerNewSeller

      public OperationResult registerNewSeller(String name, String password, String email, String phoneNumber, String address)
      Registers a new seller with the specified information.
      Parameters:
      name - The seller's name.
      password - The seller's password.
      email - The seller's email.
      phoneNumber - The seller's phone number.
      address - The seller's address.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of the registration.

    • isBuyerNameAvailable

      public boolean isBuyerNameAvailable(String username)
      Checks if a buyer username is available.
      Parameters:
      username - The buyer's username to check.
      Returns:
      true if the username is available, false otherwise.

    • isSellerNameAvailable

      public boolean isSellerNameAvailable(String name)
      Checks if a seller name is available.
      Parameters:
      name - The seller's name to check.
      Returns:
      true if the name is available, false otherwise.

    • isCorrectPassword

      public boolean isCorrectPassword(UUID userId, String password)
      Checks if the provided password is correct for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user.
      password - The password to check.
      Returns:
      true if the password is correct, false otherwise.
